articles.content: The UK appears to have reached the peak of its coronavirus outbreak. On April 22 health secretary Matt Hancock told parliament that the UK's lockdown measures that have been in place for four-and-half weeks appear to be having an effect as the number of daily… [+6952 chars]

articles.title: Coronavirus: Inside Scotland’s testing superlab - BBC News
articles.description: Scientists begin work at the Lighthouse Lab in Glasgow - one of only three similar centres in the UK.
articles.content:
Image copyrightAFPImage caption
 The Lighthouse laboratory is based at the Queen Elizabeth Hospital in Glasgow
Scientists have begun work at Scotland's coronavirus testing "superlab", aiming to transform the way we test for the virus.

articles.title: Our deadliest day yet revealed as three more Covid-19 patients die in northern Lincolnshire hospitals - Grimsby Live
articles.description: The total number of deaths at Northern Lincolnshire and Goole NHS Foundation Trust is now 44
articles.content:
Another three patients have died while being treated for coronavirus at Northern Lincolnshire and Goole NHS Foundation Trust, taking the total there to 44.
